import React from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Profile() { const user = useSelector((state) => state.userData); return ( <>
Edit Action
Another action

My Profile

{" "} Active

If several languages coalesce, the grammar of the resulting language is more simple and regular than that of the individual.

Name

Email

{user.userData.email}

Time

11:40 AM

Location

California, USA

); }
